name: Zoo Animals World Lite
description:
Let your child enjoy and learn about Zoo Animal life by touching and hearing LOTS of beutifull HD images AND SOUNDS of many diffrent zoo animals

Each image was CARFULY CHOSEN to be of intrest and educational value for you child.
We took great care in recording a friendly voice to describe the image and its content so that you child could learn while he is playing with this app.

#####
This great app ALSO allows you to upload you own images and sound making it an ever ivolving application and game

" This is a unique must have app for your child, I was thrilled to see both my kids play and interact with the images..."
- Jane Pitterson pHD

" When children ask questions and interact with what they are playing you know you have an awesome, A solid five stars review from us for this come to life photo unique photo album game"
- BestkidsApps: 5 stars out of 5

Zoo Life Touch album has 12 beutiful and well organized categories for your child to play,touch and relate with. We also included many beutiful images and sounds in this free version to get him started straight away.

Default album list:
Lions, Hedgehogs, Zebra, bears, Monkeys, Elephants, Hippos, cheetah, Camels, kangaroo, monkeys, Seals

This is not just another Touch and Hear app, This app was build by parents for toddlers

Do you want to upload new exciting images from your family album for your kid to enjoy? No problem
Easyli upload there pictures and record an explanation or a greeting to match picture.

The app was developed for my young girl and she ABSOLUTLY LOVES IT!!

***********
Educational benefits this app offers for your child:
- Expanding word vocabulary
- Expanding your childs knowledge and curiosity
- Appreciation of animals
- Eye Hand cordination


=============
We kept it simple for you and your child

*The app opens right away with main album categories so there are
*No menu pages for your child to get lost in.
*Simple one touch to view and hear his photos
*One touch photo upload from your own photo album
*One touch sound recording
*Lots of beautiful HD images for your child to interact with


FEATURES:
* Very easy to use - Your child has to Simply touch screen to hear and view picture
*Upload UNLIMITED amount of images from your photo album for hours of fun for your child
* One touch uploading of pics from your photo album
* One touch recording
* Lots of beautiful HD images and sounds you can use, record new text for or update
* 12 album categories Lions, Hedgehogs, Zebra, Bears, Monkeys, Elephants, Hippos, cheetah, Camels, Kangaroo, Monkeys, Seals
* Each Album has minimum of two different sounds and images.

Please help us to perfect "Zoo world" !
Please contact us if you have ideas to make this app even better.
If you find a bug please let us know and we shall correct it on the next build
Contact us at FamilyTouch@gmail.com

Download this precious app for your little one and see him enjoying it over and over again
